analysis.title: ANALYSIS
analysis.intro: Here you can run analytics on the data collected by the sensors to better leverage the metrics.
analysis.correlationRunning: Check the parameters and ensure that no correlation analysis is currently running.
analysis.ruptureRunning: Ensure that no rupture analysis is currently running.

directActions.title: DIRECT ACTIONS
directActions.intro: Here, you can perform actions directly on the terrarium.

mailAlert.title: Mail alert configuration
mailAlert.description: The mail address here provided will be used to SEND alerts to the user
